channel.title: Meetings on FRµIT Testbed

item.title: Project Wrap-Up Meeting
item.description: London, Thursday 27th June, 2019 The FRuIT project completes its funded phase at the end of June 2019, after nearly three years of research activity. This wrap-up meeting will review our work, highlighting achievements and outlining future plans. iframe.map { display: block; width: 49%; float: left; } img[src*="#center"] { display: block; float: right; width: 49%; } p.clear { clear: both; } The meeting will be held at the London campus of Loughborough University, in room LDN 1.
